name: Hedra
description:
Hedra is an experimental journey into the possibilities of geometric gaming. Powered by Unreal Engine 5, this early access title presents an ever-expanding universe built entirely of Tetrahedra and Octahedra.
(If low-poly graphics like in Minecraft aren't your thing, this game might not be for you :) )
Dive into a dynamic sandbox where you can shape, shatter and expand the world at will, navigate across various islands, each is a playground for different game modes like survival challenges and puzzles. As the game is being developed, new game modes will be available.

Key features:
Dynamic sandbox environment to carve sculptures, shatter your enemies, dig tunnels and build your own environment, use your imagination in a world that responds to your touch.
Navigate between different islands to switch between game modes: Sandbox, Puzzle, Survival, with other game modes and features in the works.
Experiment with various materials like steel, concrete, and grass to shape and dress the world around you differently.

Hedra is an early access title, priced at a discount rate to encourage an interactive development process. Your feedback helps determine the game's future direction and which features resonate most with the community. This isn't just a game; it's an ongoing experiment in game design, one where your voice helps shape the end product.
